channel.title: Shrooms
channel.description:
Within the past few months, I have been experimenting with some other drugs other than weed. I have had a couple of amazing experiences with MDMA, and find it to be a really fun, interesting, but quite intense drug. I have the opportunity to get hold of some magic mushrooms, and would really like to try them, however i really don't have any idea what to expect/doses/do's/don'ts etc, and would like to hear some experiences from some people. Is it better to drink on them, or should it be used alone with some bud? Any advice on how to make a bad trip less likely, and really anything to do with shrooms :P
Any info will be appreciated

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:

[quote=“pesky, post:24, topic:264017”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=348632.msg2683668#msg2683668 date=1235527783]

my sisters freind did shrooms and cut holes out of his arm thinkin things where on him… kinda put me off XD

Pics or lies. From what I’ve seen so far, you are more full of shit than a public toilet at a laxative festival.
[/quote]

he did i seen his arm… it ent like i wanted to take pics of the scars n shit is it?

Oh and food to eat them with i have a freind who likes them in pot noodles =][/quote]

Its more of a Visual enhancement. You don’t see that much crazy shit… Thats the only drug i do besides weed…

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

When i did shrooms. I was snowboarding and for an hour i did the exact same thing just went down went up no jumps no rails. The lift rides lasted hourssssssss. Music was very much inhanced and it was pretty sweet. Going down was blagh tho.

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:7, topic:264017”]thanks up for the info. im a wimp the nausea too, so i guess ill start with a low dose, and chew it up shitloads. is it possible to eat them with something else, or is this likely to make the nausea worse?

ill be with 3-4 very good friends, and should definitely be in a house. problem is, im normally have a bit of anxiety when coming up on something, but ill try and do it as optimistic as i possible can be. should be plenty of weed between us.

ty again for the post :)[/quote]

What you said about food. I once had them in a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. That worked alright haha.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Mr.Chris:

I thought they were banned too? It used to be that fresh ones were fine, but prepared weren’t, but that changed a few years ago, im sure.

Nope, i bought them from the corner shop yesterday. In the UK it’s only illegal to pick them and prepare them. But buying them and taking them is perfectly legal.

expect this.

That’s not what you should expect at all really

[/quote]

When he grabs that object and it dissapears, and the tracer effects of his movement at first, are the only thing that you could possibly expect. Even then it doesn’t look like that at all.

If you did a high enough dose to lose reality like he did, you wouldn’t even know you’re own name anymore. Or that you ever existed.[/quote]
During the high? Or even after you hit your balls on a tree branch?

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I wouldn’t eat with them. They will mess with your stomach.

Make sure you’ve had something healthy to eat that day though. Drink some water with them, but not too much. While high just tend to your needs. If you feel thirsty take a drink. An empty stomach though will let them hit faster and effect you more.

Now some people put them on pizzas, they make soup, etc. Everyone is different. Don’t make too big of a deal though, low doses aren’t going to hurt you even if you do feel like crap Just try to have some fun man. Expect lots of laughter, and tears rolling down your face from laughing so much. Your logic center will be turned off, so you will be laughing at stuff you’ve never thought you would laugh at

Read full topic

ill be with 3-4 very good friends, and should definitely be in a house. problem is, im normally have a bit of anxiety when coming up on something, but ill try and do it as optimistic as i possible can be. should be plenty of weed between us.

ty again for the post

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I’m not an expert by any means, my first time doing them was probably only a year or two ago.

What I tell you is only what works well for me. It’s a strong psychedelic, and can be very unpredictable.

The dose you do depends on the strain and the quality of them. Assuming you will be getting cubensis mushrooms(they are the most common), I would do 3 grams if you’d like to hallucinate. If your dealer isn’t a jew, and he tells you that these are very potent shrooms, dose with caution. You can take a low dose and take more in about an hour if you would like. But if you wait too long, taking more isn’t going to do very much and will be a waste. Plus the comeup itself isn’t always the best because of the anxiety and whatnot, you probably don’t want to extend the come up even longer. If you just want 1.5-2 grams, you probably won’t get anything for visuals but you will see when you get high that visuals aren’t that important, it’s really just a mind trip and you can still have a great time. But like I said it all depends on the mushrooms. Ask the people you’re getting them from about how good they are, so you will have an idea. It would suck to take 3 grams, and it ends up being a very potent strain of mushrooms. Until you’re more experienced anyways.

You can expect some nausea, possibly even vomiting. This is unlikely on low doses. It’s caused because the mushrooms cannot be digested by your body properly. It’s not poison. If possible (they taste pretty bad), chew them in your mouth for a good 15 minutes. They will turn into a very disgusting slimy texture. But it helps a lot with nausea IMO. I’m a wimp for nausea though, you just can’t have fun or enjoy it if you don’t feel good. Most of my friends don’t even experience nausea. Usually if you do, it’ll be during the comeup and you might experience nausea during the comedown too. I prescribe: Marijuana.

These are not a feel-good drug like mdma. You might just feel better, with more euphoria, but this isn’t always the case. You might just feel worse then you have ever felt in your life. Bad trips suck, they are something non-drug users will never be able to relate to, or experience. It’s just completely terrible, I’d rather be puking my guts out sicker then I have ever been, then to have another bad trip. It’s really about set and setting. Ideally, doing them with just 1 friend and no one else around at all, is probably the best. If there are people around you that are not on mushrooms, it’s not very nice and that’s hard to explain why.
In a nutshell, do them with a friend in your house or his house. Be excited to try them, not afraid about what could happen. During a bad trip you will probably think “I am never doing this again, why would ANYONE ever want to do this to themselves.” During a good trip, you will think “Wow this is absolutely amazing, what a great high it’s so nice I feel so good…” etc

The hallucinations you can expect are pretty simple. Objects might look like they are growing and shrinking, and repeating. In a breathing pattern. Everything might look like it’s moving slightly. You might see colorful patterns on the walls, especially in the dark. If your friend waves his arms around, they will leave tracers behind. Like a motion blurred trail, sometimes it’s like a jet stream of color.

The best ever is outside in the summer. Don’t go out when its shitty out though. A flock of birds fly by, they each leave long colorful trails behind them. You will appreciate nature. Inspect the wings of an insect. Look at the patterns on the wings. It’s like mother nature is the one on mushrooms… I have a nice backyard, so having access to my house and the outside is great.

On higher doses, draw stuff. Watch your drawings move and take new forms. Then look at them the next day

[quote=“the bank, post:4, topic:264017”]Don’t go outside! Stay inside!

WITH FRIENDS![/quote]

I agree if the weather is shitty, or it’s winter time. A sunny afternoon in the summer is just amazing though, like I described above.

Sorry for my post being so unstructured. There’s so much to say about them, all my thoughts just come out at once kind of Do you have any specific questions?

edit: Oh and weed. I hate mushrooms without weed, honestly. Smoke about half the amount you’d normally smoke during the comeup. Then save some for the comedown. Even having some for the next day is nice since you will feel quite drained.

And sleeping is diffacult, again weed helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Yeah he is the expert…

But a few basics:
3.5g is a pretty standard dose
Do them with friends, otherwise you will probably have a pretty bad trip
I’d say use them alone, but have some weed for the come down

I haven’t tried shrooms, but it’s on my todo list

Read full topic
